name: Walking on Fire
description: Don't look down!
requirement: Navigate the lava tunnel in Ember Bay.

name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 69
requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

name: Daily Desert Vista Viewer
description: Always on the lookout for a good view.
requirement: View a vista in one of the following locations: Crystal Oasis, the Desert Highlands, Elon Riverlands, the Desolation, or the Domain of Vabbi.

name: Lake Doric Master
requirement: Collect all  items to prove your mastery over Lake Doric.
locked_text: Acquire a Sentient Seed by combining the four sentient creations from Season 3. Misplaced items can be obtained from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

name: Coming Home
description: Journal: Coming Home Completed
requirement: Complete Coming Home.

name: Chuka and Champawat II: Ambush
description: Your first attempt to craft the legendary precursor Tigris has been modestly successful, but it has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

name: Stay Frosty
requirement: Complete the Shiverpeaks Pass Strike Mission.

name: Rolling Competitor: Jormag's Fang
requirement: Complete 15 laps of the roller beetle race in Snowden Drifts. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

name: [FTT 202] Intermediate Dynamics—Area Damage Level 2
requirement: Built / Area Damage Level 1 Turrets

name: Daily Siren's Landing: Kingpin Killer
description: Take care of them.
requirement: Take down the Event Kingpins around Siren's Landing.

name: Raiders of the Lost Parts
requirement: Find and retrieve Taimi's golem parts from the Edge of the Mists.

name: Machined Dagger
requirement: Collect all  items to forge your Machined Dagger.

name: Tengu Weapon Collector
requirement: Unlock all 16 tengu weapon skins in your wardrobe.

name: Daily Tier 3 Aetherblade
requirement: Complete Aetherblade at fractal scale 51 or higher.

name: End of Dragons: Act 4 Mastery
requirement: Complete all  End of Dragons: Act 4 achievements.

name: Dive Master: Prospect Valley
requirement: Find and use a diving location in Prospect Valley.

name: A Rallying Flame
requirement: Commemorate the completion of the Flame and Frost story by celebrating with your new allies in Hoelbrak.

name: Spirit Crafter
description: <c=@flavor>May the spirits of the past protect me now and forever.</c>
requirement: Unlock  spirit weapons in your wardrobe.

name: Royal Flame Weapons
requirement: Unlock all  Royal Flame weapon skins in your wardrobe.

name: Shiver Reward Track
requirement: Purchase Shivering Ice from a recruited faction vendor in Eye of the North.

name: A Soaring Stench
description: A fine ride with a not-so-fine smell.
requirement: Soar through Caustic Spur to reach the overlook cache.

name: Emotionless
requirement: Defeat Eparch in the Lonely Tower fractal without allowing him to reach 20 stacks of any emotional attunement.

name: Home Sweet Homestead: Dragon's End
description: Wait. I'm missing a decoration. I sense... Grandfather!
requirement: Complete events in Dragon's End. Group events will award more progress.

name: Seasons of the Dragons
requirement: Complete  Return meta-achievements. Return meta-achievements will become available over time, and they are permanently available once introduced.

name: Revenge of the Death-Branded Shatterer (Weekly)
requirement: Participate in the Death-Branded Shatterer event.

name: Convergence Challenge Mode—Umbriel: Gold
description: Another loss for House Aurkus.
requirement: Earn gold-rank timing in a Convergence with challenge mode active for this legendary creature.

name: Never-Ending Nurture Knowledge
description: The more you know...
requirement: Successfully complete events in the Bastion of Knowledge.

bits.text: Prepare for the Kryptis assault on the gates.
Aid the Astral Ward in defending or retaking the bastion gates.
Root out the evidence that some of the library archivists are possesed.
Defeat the Avatar of Gluttony before it abosrbs the knowledge of Amnytas.

name: Stealing the Limelight
requirement: Try to steal the show.

name: Fishmongers Know Me
description: You can fish your whole life without understanding it was never the fish you were truly after.
requirement: Complete  fishing collections.

name: Return to Ember Bay
requirement: Complete  Return to Rising Flames achievements.

name: Tester of Secrets, Under 3
requirement: Find all the green baubles in the World 3 Test Zone.

name: Weapons Tester
description: Their aim wasn't so hot.
requirement: Destroy the thermal core without being struck by any molten weapon attacks.

name: Emergency Dragon Responder: Bloodtide Coast
requirement: Complete the Bloodtide Coast Dragon Response Mission.

name: Chasing Tales: Hobbler
description: Mouglon could spot the flaw in any defense.
requirement: Apply 30 conditions with a mace in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Applied 30 conditions with a mace in Thunderhead Peaks.

name: Siege the Stronghold
requirement: Assault the Stronghold of the Faithful and gain access to the courtyard.

name: RGB
requirement: Obtain each pylon attunement once, and defeat the Vale Guardian.

name: Born for Battle
description:
Story Instance: Taimi's Pet Project

"AAAARRRRRGGHHH!"
requirement: Defeat ten mercenaries during the final surge.

name: Watch Your Step!
requirement: Don't get caught in any bloated creeper explosions.

name: Beetlemania
description: Collection: Help Gorrik make a new friend.
requirement: Collect the items Gorrik asked for to complete Petey's guided evolution.

name: Elon Riverlands Rift Hunting
requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Elon Riverlands.

name: Mistburned Barrens Insight: Alliance Staging Ground Overlook
requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery Insight in Mistburned Barrens.

name: Onsite Procurement
requirement: Commandeer and fire stone cannons in the Forging Steel vision.

name: Chasing Tales: The Old Ways
description: "Ganging up on an old man, eh?"
requirement: Defeat 30 enemies while wielding a staff in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Defeated 30 enemies with a staff in Thunderhead Peaks.

name: The Whispers Way
description:
Story Instance: Confessor's End

"For those who prefer to do it real quiet-like."
requirement: Instead of killing them, avoid both jade construct sentries.

name: Soft Lander
description: Story Instance: Scarlet's Playhouse
requirement: Survive jumping from the upper arena ring into a hay pile.

name: Pest Control
requirement: Stamp out 100 invasive devourer nests.

name: Tormented Weapon Collection
description: <c=@flavor>The jealous are troublesome to others, but certainly a torment to themselves.</c>
requirement: Unlock all  Tormented weapon skins in your wardrobe.

name: Aftermath Viathan Cleaner
requirement: Complete  event in and around Viathan Lake in Kessex Hills.

name: Trick-or-Treat across Tyria
requirement: Participate in Mad King Says or defeat any champion enemies across Tyria.

name: Special Mission: Clear the Lighthouse
requirement: Defeat  Dominion charr in Lighthouse Point in the Drizzlewood Coast.

name: Jilai the Radiant
requirement: Defeat the earth djinn Jilai the Radiant.

name: Dragon Response Initiate
requirement: Complete  Dragon Response Mission.

name: Daily Maguuma Wastes Vista Viewer
description: Always on the lookout for a good view.
requirement: View a vista in one of the following Maguuma Wastes maps: Dry Top and the Silverwastes.

name: (Annual) Boss Blitz: Beat Boom-Boom
requirement: Defeat Boom-Boom Baines during a Boss Blitz event in the Crown Pavilion. This achievement can be completed once every year.

name: Return to Dry Top 1
requirement: Complete  Return to Gates of Maguuma and Entanglement achievements.

name: Don't Cross the Streams
description: Every molecule in your body exploded at the speed of light.
requirement: Use ley-line magic in the middle of a ley line.

name: Turtle Unlock: Suiting Up
requirement: Collect parts to construct a turtle saddle and turrets.
locked_text: Unlocks once your turtle is fully grown.

name: (Weekly) Convergences
description: Hope you enjoy your stay—Kryptis hordes are on the way!
requirement: Successfully complete  weekly Convergence.

name: Warpblade
requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the weaver's sword, Warpblade.
locked_text: Begin training the elementalist's weaver elite specialization.

name: Anomalies of the World
requirement: Disperse Ley-Line Anomalies in all of the areas they appear.

name: Echovald Wilds Mastery
description: Though Echovald may not always grow, it is far from dead.
requirement: Complete achievements within the Echovald Wilds.

name: Roller Beetle Training: Silver
requirement: Earn this achievement by opening the silver chest.

name: Champion's Dawn
description: Journal: Champion's Dawn Completed
requirement: Travel to Champion's Dawn in pursuit of Zaeim.

name: "Endurance" Strongbox
requirement: Search in the Griffonfall area for the strongbox from the "Endurance."

name: On the Case
description: Journal: On the Case
requirement: Delve into the strange goings-on in the mines.

name: Skrilla's Benefactor
description: Fastest way to a skritt's heart.
requirement: Give Skrilla enough coin to make her happy!

name: Shattered
description: They're really quite brittle.
requirement: Break 5 people out of crystal prisons created by the Shatterer.

name: Hologram Herder
requirement: Participate in Hologram Stampede events.

name: Quell the Storm
description: Fight hard against the treacherous tempest.
requirement: Defeat Cardinal Sabir while the challenge mote is active.

name: Ox's Revelation
requirement: Defeat the Ox's Champion Fallen Pineshade while fighting Drakkar in Bjora Marches.

name: Spirit Watch Killer
description: Only one team can ascend.
requirement: Defeat  player during Spirit Watch rated matches.

name: Daily End of Dragons Forager
description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
requirement: Gather raw materials by foraging plants in the following locations: Seitung Province, New Kaineng City, Echovald Wilds, or Dragon's End.

name: The Most Dangerous Game
description: No, the prey isn't human...
requirement: Reach and complete the final stage of an Itzel hunting excursion.

name: Black Lion Requisition Mission Week 1
description: The Black Lion Trading Company needs your help!
requirement: Turn in materials with the Black Lion Requisition Officers at any major city during the event window.

name: Machined Focus
requirement: Collect all  items to forge your Machined Focus.

name: The Path of Most Resistance
requirement: Complete the Kaineng Overlook Strike Mission with challenge mode active after triggering Equalization Protocol.

name: Not Today
description:
Nothing is allowed to have that many legs and stay alive.

Story Instance: Legacy
requirement: Defeat the spider broodmother without being downed or defeated.

name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 31
requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

name: Adept Renegade
requirement: Begin training the revenant's renegade elite specialization.

name: Skywatch Archipelago Insight: MinSec Server Room
requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Skywatch Archipelago.

name: Candy Craver
requirement: Eat 50 pieces of candy corn.

name: Treetop Retriever
description: They made the ultimate sacrifice.
requirement: Locate the 10 lost Priory corpses in the Tarnished Treetop of Auric Basin.

bits.text: A female asura researcher was last seen north of Wanderer's Waypoint.
Since he went to an upper ledge to examine the Exalted portal, the asura researcher hasn't been heard from.
Someone overheard the Zintl boasting about finding the remains of a female charr explorer.
Echoes of a male charr explorer fighting a large colony of vampire beasts filled the canopy the other night.
A human explorer bailed from the airship too early. She was lost near Capitzel Grounds.
Heading east, the explorer was cornered by a jaguar. The human never made it down from the canopy.
An injured norn historian held off the bonebreaker so others could escape. Her sacrifice won't be forgotten.
A lower ledge broke his fall, but then the norn explorer was surrounded by Tengu scouts.
A sylvari historian got trapped along the northern cliffside of Tarnished Treetop. She had little chance to survive.
An explorer tried to find his way south and down from the canopy. The sylvari only found a Coztic ambush.

name: Speedy Sprinter
description: Place among the top three racers in Sanctum Sprint.
requirement: Place in the top three  times.

name: Convergence Challenge Mode—Demon Knight: Gold
description: Fear not this Demon Knight.
requirement: Earn gold-rank timing in a Convergence with challenge mode active for this legendary creature.

name: Surf and Turf
description: Sea or Shore? Who will prevail?
requirement: Earn your sea legs by completing these achievements.

name: Bitterfrost Frontier Insight: The Bitter Cold
requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Bitterfrost Frontier.

name: Bitterfrost Frontier Incursions
requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in Bitterfrost Frontier.

name: Death to the Dominion
requirement:
Collect Charr Commendations for the legions by defeating Dominion forces and accomplishing objectives in the Drizzlewood Coast.
Speak with a quaestor in any allied base to change which legion your commendations go to.

name: Ooze Herding
description: Safe ooze handling is an important lesson in any curriculum.
requirement: Return an ooze to the ooze farmer in each zone.

name: Vision I: Awakening
description: Breathe deeply and open all three of your eyes.
requirement: Experience the old through new eyes.
locked_text: Purchase a Trance Stone from any Volatile Magic vendor to unlock this achievement.

bits.text: Complete the Visions of Istan collection.
Complete the Visions of Sandswept Isles collection.
Complete the Visions of Kourna collection.
Complete the Visions of Jahai collection.
Complete the Visions of Thunderhead Peaks collection.
Complete the Visions of Dragonfall collection.

name: What Does She Know?
description: So close, yet so far.
requirement: Quickly gain access to Scarlet's secret room.

name: (Weekly) Convergences: Mount Balrior
description: "Gather 'round for another tale of triumph and struggle..."
requirement: Successfully complete  (Weekly) Convergence: Mount Balrior.

name: Master Diver: Kessex Hills
description: This chest can be reopened once per week or per completion of the Master Diver achievement.
requirement: Find and open the sunken chest in Kessex Hills.

name: Fractal Master
description: <c=@flavor>WARNING: some fractals may cause injury, psychic trauma, blindness, or death.</c>
requirement: Unlock all  fractal weapon skins in your wardrobe.

name: Siren's Landing Insight: Lava Leap
requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Siren's Landing.

name: Gyala Delve Jade Bot Racer: Silver
requirement: Complete the Gyala Delve Jade Bot Racer adventure with a silver rating or better.

name: Daily Claw of Jormag
requirement: Defeat the Claw of Jormag on the Frostwalk Tundra in Frostgorge Sound.

name: Aurora II: Empowering
requirement: Collect all  items to create a Spark of Sentience.

name: Survey on Subjects of Importance
requirement: Take a poll from a traveling journalist krewe.

name: An Impostor Walks among Us
description: You'll have to take off your shoes.
requirement: Without being caught or leaving the area, sabotage the Speakers Headquarters, taking the renown heart from completely empty to completely full.

name: Peace and Quiet
requirement: Complete Silent Surf on the Master tier with no deaths, no Black Powder Charges used before the final encounter, and no interactions with Captain Thess's portals.

name: Fine Wining
requirement: Consume  wines from around Tyria.
locked_text: Purchase a Vintner's Guide from Gastronome Plikk in Rata Sum.

name: Arborstone Hide-and-Seek Master
requirement: Find the hiding tengu fledgling within 60 seconds.

name: Domain of Vabbi Insight: Zagonur Towers
requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in the Domain of Vabbi.

name: Mischief Maker
description: Story Instance: Recalibrating the Waypoints
requirement: Urge Taimi to yell at Braham during the recalibration device demonstration.

name: Special Mission: Declawed
requirement: Defeat the Claw of Jormag  times in the Northern Drizzlewood Coast.

name: Abaddon's Ascent
description: Conquer your acrophobia!
requirement: Reach the top of the tower.

name: Sign Cutting
description: Journal: Sign Cutting Completed
requirement: Follow the trail that was laid out for you.

name: Stay Out!
description: When you say you'll defend something, you really mean it!
requirement: Defend  objectives.

name: Master of Mummies
description: Story Instance: "Enemy of My Enemy"
requirement: Close the portal without ever switching to your personal skills.

name: Friends in High Places
description: You've always got a friend at ArenaNet.
requirement: Enter Lion's Arch in the month of February.

name: Shockwave Skipper
description: They can't hurt what they can't hit.
requirement: Defeated the leaders of the Molten Alliance without being hit by a shockwave.

name: Slippery as a Fish
requirement: Complete the Vasburg Armory minidungeon without getting hit by any traps.

name: Bright Inquisitor Weapon Collection
requirement: Unlock all  Bright Inquisitor weapon skins in your wardrobe.

name: Misty Leap
requirement: Use diving goggles to jump from the top of the secluded southern waterfall.

name: Daily Crystal Bloom Missions
requirement: Complete  Dragon Response Mission.

name: Visions of Dragonfall
description:
Crashing to the earth, cleaving the Mists...

Note: Completion of this achievement requires completion of the Riding Skyscales achievement.
requirement: Explore the isle of Dragonfall for greater insight.
locked_text: Purchase a Trance Stone from any Volatile Magic vendor to unlock this collection.

name: Luminescent Gloves
requirement: Collect the  parts required to assemble Luminescent Gloves.

name: Live Wire
requirement: Suffer the shocking fate of curiosity.

name: Blitz Breaker
requirement: Complete a Boss Blitz meta-event in the Crown Pavilion.

name: Loot Finder
requirement: Find all the hidden chests.

bits.text: You'll miss it the first time.
If you can't stand the heat...

name: Daily Pig Iron Quarry Jumping Puzzle
requirement: Complete the Pig Iron Quarry jumping puzzle in Fireheart Rise.

name: Bachelor of Secrets, World 1
description: Bombs not included.
requirement: Find all of the hidden rooms (excluding furniture shops) in World 1, Zone 2.

name: Prima Donna
requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the virtuoso's dagger, Prima Donna.
locked_text: Begin training the mesmer's virtuoso elite specialization.

name: Dragon's End Culture: The Luxon Armada
requirement: Participate in all events related to the Luxon armada.

bits.text: Drive naga invaders and looters away from Kaolai Tower.
Defeat the summoned creature before it can escape.
Lead newly hatched turtles to the safety of the hatchery ponds.
Defeat the enemies attacking Juno Hatchery.

name: Defeating the Icebrood
requirement: Defeat  Icebrood enemy in Frostgorge Sound.

name: Thwart the Inquest
requirement: Don't allow the Inquest to collect any accumulated ley-line magic.

name: (Annual) Snow Drifter
requirement: Complete the race event in Divinity's Reach during Wintersday in under 3 minutes. Achievement can be completed once per year.

name: Head's Up!
requirement: Drop three stalactites on the enraged amber elemental.

name: Daily Domain of Istan Racer
requirement: Complete a race within the Domain of Istan.

name: Words of Mending
locked_text: Speak with Amira in Sun's Refuge.

name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 64
requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

name: League Top Stats—Recruit
description: Completing this achievement advances the meta-achievement Path of the Ascension I: The Thrill of Battle.
requirement: Earn 25 top stats in ranked matches.

name: Realm Avenger IX
requirement: Kill  player.

name: White Hat
description: "I'll create a BLUI interface using virtual cones—see if I can track the device." —Taimi
requirement: Hack Inquest terminals.

name: The First City
description: Journal: The First City Completed
requirement: Travel to the First City in pursuit of your friend.

name: True Dragon
description: Glory to the true dragon!
requirement: Reach PvP rank 469.

name: Commanding Officer
description: The best commanders have the loyalty of their troops.
requirement: Summon  archer or door breaker during Battle of Champion's Dusk rated matches.

name: Bodyguarded
requirement: Escort the Flame Legion shaman to Doomlore Shrine without him getting downed.

name: Defender: Amber Sandfall
requirement: Successfully defend Amber Sandfall from the Mordrem after the Pact forces holding the fort have achieved level 3 defenses.

name: Mad Drifter
requirement: Complete a lap of any race event or time trial in the Mad King's Raceway within the challenge time.

name: Returning to Scarlet's War
requirement: Meet with Captain Ellen Kiel in Lion's Arch to learn about the Return to Season 1 event.

name: Reuniting Lost Kryptis: Gold
requirement:
Earn a gold medal in the Reuniting Lost Kryptis adventure.

(Progress will update when you claim the rewards from this adventure.)

name: Wurm Phytotoxin Collector
requirement: Collect each of the  colored phytotoxins around the crimson great jungle wurm.

name: Devona's Rest Veteran
description: Days gone by...
requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

name: Voice in the Deep
description: Journal: Voice in the Deep Completed
requirement: Complete Voice in the Deep.

name: Auric Basin Insight: Southwatch Creep
requirement: Discover Insights of Maguuma Mastery in Auric Basin.

name: The Queen of Battle
description: Journal: Battle's Eve
requirement: Spar with Barbed Vale without being downed.

name: Paladin's Decree Weapon Collection
requirement: Unlock all  Paladin's Decree weapon skins in your wardrobe.

name: Day Trader
requirement: Trade with vendors in the Labyrinthine Cliffs for Zephyrite Supply Boxes, and open the boxes.

name: Salvage Master
description: More interested in what's inside...or just in seeing it fall apart.
requirement: Salvage  items.

name: Avid Krytan Fisher
description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
requirement: Collect  different fish from the waterways of Kryta.

name: Emergency Maintenance
requirement: Repair the tank with patch kits or scrap.

name: Legendary Weapon: Sunrise
requirement: Craft the legendary weapon Sunrise.

name: Realm Avenger V
requirement: Kill  player.

name: Grothmar Grand Tour: Pole Position
requirement: Finish the Grothmar Grand Tour in the top three.

name: Blood and Sand
description: Rumors in Elon Riverlands speak of a terrifying sand shark that's attracted to the scent of blood in the dunes.
requirement: Kill the monstrous sand shark, Mazomba.

name: Revenge of Kuda
requirement: Defeat the Inquest's champions in the Specimen Chamber.

name: Delicious Desserts
requirement: Give a little quaggan sweets to annoy its parents.

name: Very Enthusiastic about Wrestling
description: Let the entire arena know about your passion!
requirement: Cheer 20 times within the arena.

name: Return to Forging Steel
requirement: Complete the story mission Forging Steel in Living World Icebrood Saga Visions of the Past: Steel and Fire.

name: Weekly Jade Vault
requirement: Find 4 jade statuettes for Myung-Hee, Keeper of the Jade Vault, and return them to her.

name: Local Response: Battle for Lion's Arch (Weekly)
requirement: Complete events during the battle for Lion's Arch. Participating in the defeat of the Assault Knight Trio during the finale grants extra progress.

name: Hide-and-Seek in the Wizard's Tower: Master
requirement: Find the hiding djinn in the Wizard's Tower within 60 seconds.

name: Scouting for Scouts
description: Journal: Missing in Action
requirement: Find the missing scouting party within the time limit.

name: Light it up!
requirement: Ignite the Flame Legion effigy 10 times in the Effigy event.

name: Centaur Slayer
description: A few more centaur herds are thinned out.
requirement: Kill  centaurs.

name: Inner Nayos: Nyedra Surrounds Savior
description: You can rest at ease knowing you've helped out everywhere in Nyedra Surrounds.
requirement: Complete event-completion achievements throughout Nyedra Surrounds in Inner Nayos.

name: Daily Ebon Vanguard Missions
requirement: Complete  Dragon Response Mission.

name: Special Mission: Thirsty Work
requirement: Bring water to  exhausted sentries in allied bases around the Drizzlewood Coast.
locked_text: Unlock by using Blood Legion Special Mission Documents.

name: Hero's Origin: Caledon Forest
requirement:
Complete events in Caledon Forest in the Maguuma Jungle.

<c=@reminder>You can find events while exploring the world. Events are marked by an orange circle on your map when you're nearby.</c>

name: Domain of Kourna Griffon Master: Silver
requirement: Earn this achievement by opening the silver chest.

name: Shadow Weapon Collection
requirement: Unlock all  Shadow weapon skin in your wardrobe.

name: Woodpecker
description: Take down the kingpin.
requirement: Destroy all tree stumps in World 2 Tribulation Mode.

name: Verdant Brink Insight: Creaking Cavern
requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Verdant Brink.

name: Ascalon Explorer
description: You've explored the ancestral territory of the charr.
requirement: Explore all areas in Ascalon.

bits.text: Plains of Ashford: Ascalon City Ruins
Plains of Ashford: Old Duke's Estate
Plains of Ashford: Village of Smokestead
Plains of Ashford: The Toppled Wall
Black Citadel: War Wagon Prep Deck
Iron Marches: Sunken Halls of Clarent
Fields of Ruin: Stronghold of Ebonhawke
Fields of Ruin: The Siege Plains
Fields of Ruin: The Ogre Road
Fields of Ruin: Last Stand Shelter
Diessa Plateau: Village of Butcher's Block

name: Cleanup Duty
requirement: Erase  Jade Brotherhood graffiti in New Kaineng City.

name: Toxic Krait Transcriber
requirement: Speak with Priory Arcanist Dolja at Thunder Ridge camp during Season 1 Episode 4 to receive an obelisk transcriber.

name: Daily Adventure: A Fungus Among Us
requirement: Open the bronze daily reward chest from this adventure!

name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 4
requirement: Complete  scale 4 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

name: Crop Harvester: Sandswept Isles
requirement: Harvest plants  times in the Sandswept Isles.

name: Skywatch Archipelago Insight: Southern Clearing
requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Skywatch Archipelago.

name: Playing with the Infants
description: Our guardians said we could play here!
requirement: Play with all of the shrine guardian infants in Gyala Delve at least once.

bits.text: Listening to the sounds of a waterfall.
Pretending to be a giant hermit crab.
At the bottom of a ravine.
Likes to watch jade being cut down.
Camping around a crashed mining rig.

name: Zodiac Weapon Collection
description: <c=@flavor>Will you unlock the mystery of the stars after collecting all these skins? Only one way to find out.</c>
requirement: Unlock all  Zodiac weapon skins in your wardrobe.

name: Wavering Ward
description: A full party of five must participate in the fractal from start to finish without dying.
requirement: Accept the harbinger's challenge and complete the Lonely Tower fractal without anyone in your group being defeated.

name: Bringing Balance
description: Books are stacked on the left, paper and pens to the right... Everything had its place on Lyhr's desk—even a rusted stein, sitting atop an old journal with the letter "R" carved on its leatherbound spine.
requirement: Successfully complete events in the Bastion of Balance.

bits.text: Escort Lyhr to the Great Debate Hall so he can rebalance himself.
Bring order to the Great Debate Hall by defeating Kryptis and smashing the gavel.
Engage the avatars and free the Bastion of Balance.

name: Seaside Victory
description: To the victor go the seashells.
requirement: Win  rated match on Revenge of the Capricorn.

name: Courtly Service
requirement: Tithe  gold commissioning services for the Mad King's Labyrinth.

name: Return to Season 4
requirement: Complete  achievements from the Return to Season 4 event.

name: That Had to Burn
description: Good thing we built this megalaser here.
requirement: Fire the megalaser at Tequatl the Sunless.

name: Fire for Effect
description: Story Instance: Discovering Scarlet's Breakthrough
requirement: Kill five Inquest with one barrage from Scarlet's turrets.

name: Etherbound Weapon Collection
requirement: Unlock all  Etherbound weapon skin in your wardrobe.

name: Decade of Champions: Fire Elemental
requirement: Defeat the fire elemental in the Thaumanova Reactor in Metrica Province.

name: Scouting the Vale: Bronze
requirement: Earn a bronze medal in the Scouting the Vale adventure.

name: League Conqueror—2v2 Season One
requirement: Win  ranked matches during 2v2 Season One.

name: Uncertain Times
description: Journal: Uncertain Times.
requirement: Deal with questions from a new source.

name: Nurture Knowledge
description: The more you know...
requirement: Successfully complete events in the Bastion of Knowledge.

bits.text: Prepare for the Kryptis assault on the gates.
Aid the Astral Ward in defending or retaking the Bastion Gates.
Root out evidence that some of the library archivists are possessed.
Defeat the Avatar of Gluttony before it absorbs the knowledge of Amnytas.

name: Daily Caledon Forest Dragon Response Mission
requirement: Complete the Caledon Forest Dragon Response Mission.

name: Seafarer's Rest Veteran
description: Days gone by...
requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

name: Daily Echovald Wilds Jade Brotherhood Slayer
requirement: Kill 25 Jade Brotherhood in Echovald Wilds.
